short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Word Counter and rate calculator Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Word counter and price calculator for professional freelance translators and linguists.
This extension built in cooperation between https://gigopen.com and https://smartlation.com allows you to count all words within a website page and calculate the price according to your price per word.

Developed by GIGopen.com IT Manager Mario Mu√±oz for the freelance community.
